p: Serial dilution was done to reduce a dense culture of cells to a more usable concentration. Each dilution done reduces the concentration by a certain amount. A mass of 5 g of each sample was weighed and placed in 45 ml of peptone water solution. Serial dilution was performed for 10 ‐1, 10 −2, 10 −3, 10 −4, 10 −5, and 10 −6. The serial dilution done for 10 −3 provided very clear and distinct isolate; hence, it was selected for the subsequent analysis (Fung, 1985).
